channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: In case you were wondering how Maga land is responding to Garland: The Post Millenial sent our four tweets, highlighting Garland’s not taking questions, none mentioning the request to unseal the warrant. Ben Shapiro retweeted a similar clip emphasizing not taking questions. https://t.co/vXQuNE97VD
item.source:markdown: In case you were wondering how Maga land is responding to Garland: The Post Millenial sent our four tweets, highlighting Garland’s not taking questions, none mentioning the request to unseal the warrant. Ben Shapiro retweeted a similar clip emphasizing not taking questions. https://t.co/vXQuNE97VD

item.description: @MondeBoeuf @AkivaMCohen Really just 2D. But against a player whose only strengths are in the game of poke her.
item.source:markdown: @MondeBoeuf @AkivaMCohen Really just 2D. But against a player whose only strengths are in the game of poke her.

item.description: Really interesting. https://t.co/0AuUER3ob4
item.source:markdown: Really interesting. https://t.co/0AuUER3ob4

item.description: @froomkin Seems like Garland has now proven capable of playing quiet, cautious two-dimensional chess. Which given the skills of his opponent and his opponent’s allies puts him in a good position.
item.source:markdown: @froomkin Seems like Garland has now proven capable of playing quiet, cautious two-dimensional chess. Which given the skills of his opponent and his opponent’s allies puts him in a good position.

item.description:
@AkivaMCohen Also, the warrant and receipt is damning. Though I’m inclined to believe that TFG may have just held on to documents out of sheer stupid criminal insolence, rather than to obstruct justice or commit espionage.

@AkivaMCohen However, given that lazy violation of secrecy statutes has been a major political issue in recent years….

@AkivaMCohen My theory is based on “Trump’s Razor”: it’s always the stupidest explanation.
@joshtpm Seems pretty unfair of Wray to not send agents to Plains, GA to make sure no former president is snacking on illegally methylated peanuts.
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm Seems pretty unfair of Wray to not send agents to Plains, GA to make sure no former president is snacking on illegally methylated peanuts.

item.description: @trekonomics This showed up on my Twitter feed yesterday. The price of having friends in humanities academe.
item.source:markdown: @trekonomics This showed up on my Twitter feed yesterday. The price of having friends in humanities academe.

item.description:
@froomkin Thinking about @joshtpm’s “Trump’s Razor”: that it’s always the stupidest explanation.

@froomkin @joshtpm I’m imagining TFG petulantly refusing to properly file anything that crossed his desk after the election, instead stashing it in his quarters.

@froomkin @joshtpm The result is 25 boxes of stolen government files, some of them top secret, some of those seriously important military information, but all stolen simply out of a lifelong aversion to following rules.

@froomkin @joshtpm Similarly, the ten boxes taken back by the FBI this week weren’t particularly more valuable than those returned, but just kept out of a general principle of not following rules.

@froomkin @joshtpm Not part of an effort to cover up 1/6, not part of an effort to sell secrets to foreign powers, but just pure stupid criminality.

@froomkin @joshtpm So far I think this theory matches what evidence we have.
@frumfollies @ShulimLeifer @JewishWonk Isn’t that information pretty much already available online? Says the man whose bris can be googled in the Southern Israelite archives.
item.source:markdown: @frumfollies @ShulimLeifer @JewishWonk Isn’t that information pretty much already available online? Says the man whose bris can be googled in the Southern Israelite archives.

item.description: @typolad Again, unfairly raising the standard. First shaming men for not taking out the trash. Now for being trash. Will this never end?
item.source:markdown: @typolad Again, unfairly raising the standard. First shaming men for not taking out the trash. Now for being trash. Will this never end?

item.description: @jschuster59 @lmorchard @scalzi Don’t know about video bootlegging, but I recently verified to my satisfaction that the statute of limitations for my Napster downloading habit has expired.
item.source:markdown: @jschuster59 @lmorchard @scalzi Don’t know about video bootlegging, but I recently verified to my satisfaction that the statute of limitations for my Napster downloading habit has expired.

item.description: @kampeas Says the man who has spent over a decade at @jtanews yet failed to get them back into the cartooning business.

item.description: @joshtpm “It would be irresponsible not to speculate.”
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm “It would be irresponsible not to speculate.”

item.description:
If you want to read only one brilliant PKD pastiche featuring an animatronic Golda Meir, you’re going to want to buy this bundle. https://t.co/IkNzmUQbxK

If you want to read two, you’re going to have to write the second yourself.
item.source:markdown:
If you want to read only one brilliant PKD pastiche featuring an animatronic Golda Meir, you’re going to want to buy this bundle. https://t.co/IkNzmUQbxK
If you want to read two, you’re going to have to write the second yourself.

item.description: The thing about the Republican Messiah not returning classified documents after being asked politely is that there’s no way to know whether it’s for Deep Nefarious Purposed (eg selling them to his Russian or Saudi associate) or simply his lifelong aversion to following the law. https://t.co/tMYV9RJ1ho
item.source:markdown: The thing about the Republican Messiah not returning classified documents after being asked politely is that there’s no way to know whether it’s for Deep Nefarious Purposed (eg selling them to his Russian or Saudi associate) or simply his lifelong aversion to following the law. https://t.co/tMYV9RJ1ho

item.description:
@RB_Lemberg However, Paul Simeon’s effort at auto ethnography is one of his worst. https://t.co/eZifxm9e9I

@RB_Lemberg It’s a shame because it’s one of two horrible songs on an otherwise wonderful album.

item.description: @AmyGuterman @isaacdecastrog When I visited, Mexico City had four Jewish communities: One Ashkenazi, one Sefardi, one from Aleppo and one from Damascus.

item.description: @bayes_baes Having taken linear algebra 40 years ago, I was surprised and impressed to discover it’s now apparently pronounced “machine learning.”
item.source:markdown: @bayes_baes Having taken linear algebra 40 years ago, I was surprised and impressed to discover it’s now apparently pronounced “machine learning.”

item.description:
@MisfitTorah So, it’s a brilliant Haggadah that blew me away when I saw it in the museum space in the YU library 40 years ago. Definitely worth googling

@MisfitTorah Anyway, here’s the two page spread for בכל דור ודור which I bought as a framed print. The grey ovals are mirror leaf. https://t.co/w4jJNCS8sr

@MisfitTorah My report on his local visit. https://t.co/GmMHpJvEIQ

@MisfitTorah If you zoom in to the spread, you’ll note that the faces are from different centuries. בכל דור ודור, but also an awareness that his Haggadah is building off of thousands of years of Jewish iconography.
@MisfitTorah Are you familiar with the Moss Haggadah?
item.source:markdown: @MisfitTorah Are you familiar with the Moss Haggadah?
